text: If men are honest, everything they do and everywhere they go is for a chance to see women.
author: Jack Nicholson

text: To tax and to please, no more than to love and to be wise, is not given to men.
author: Edmund Burke

text: There are one hundred men seeking security to one able man who is willing to risk his fortune.
author: J. Paul Getty

text: It is, generally, in the season of prosperity that men discover their real temper, principles, and designs.
author: Edmund Burke

text: I think that the day you've figured out the differences between women and men is the day that you're no longer attracted to women. It's the difference that is so fantastic and frustrating and angering, and really sexy.
author: Kiefer Sutherland
